entry.title: equ
entry.content:
I Like This

S=∫t1t2L(q,q˙,t)dtS = \int_{t_1}^{t_2} L(q, \dot{q}, t) dtS=∫t1​t2​​L(q,q˙​,t)dt (1)(1)(1)

The formula 式. 1 declares the definition of action.

Table 1: 今晚加鸡腿
A B C
1 2 3
jbsin⁡ jb \sin jbsin (2)(2)(2)

式. 3

noas no as noas (3)(3)(3)
ψ(x)={D∣p(x)∣exp⁡(−1ℏ∫x2x∣p(x′)∣dx′),(x>x2)(a)2Dp(x)sin⁡(1ℏ∫xx2p(x′)dx′+π4),(x1<x<x2)(b)D∣p(x)∣[2cos⁡θ⋅exp⁡(1ℏ∫xx1∣p(x′)∣dx′)+sin⁡θ⋅exp⁡(−1ℏ∫xx1∣p(x′)∣dx′)],(x<x1)(c) \psi(x)=\left\{ \begin{aligned} &\frac{D}{\sqrt{|p(x)|}}\exp \left( -\frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x_2}^{x}|p(x')|dx' \right), \quad (x > x_2) &(a)\\ &\frac{2D}{\sqrt{p(x)}}\sin \left( \frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_2}p(x')dx' + \frac{\pi}{4} \right), \quad (x_1 < x < x_2) &(b)\\ &\frac{D}{\sqrt{|p(x)|}}\left[ 2\cos\theta \cdot \exp \left( \frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_1}|p(x')|dx' \right) \right. \\ &\left. +\sin\theta \cdot \exp \left( -\frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_1}|p(x')|dx' \right) \right], \quad (x < x_1) &(c)\\ \end{aligned} \right. ψ(x)=⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​​∣p(x)∣​D​exp(−ℏ1​∫x2​x​∣p(x′)∣dx′),(x>x2​)p(x)​2D​sin(ℏ1​∫xx2​​p(x′)dx′+4π​),(x1​<x<x2​)∣p(x)∣​D​[2cosθ⋅exp(ℏ1​∫xx1​​∣p(x′)∣dx′)+sinθ⋅exp(−ℏ1​∫xx1​​∣p(x′)∣dx′)],(x<x1​)​(a)(b)(c)​ (4)(4)(4)

do you like 式. 4(a)?

去找喵星人

ψ(x)={D∣p(x)∣exp⁡(−1ℏ∫x2x∣p(x′)∣dx′),(x>x2)(a)2Dp(x)sin⁡(1ℏ∫xx2p(x′)dx′+π4),(x1<x<x2)(b)D∣p(x)∣[2cos⁡θ⋅exp⁡(1ℏ∫xx1∣p(x′)∣dx′)+sin⁡θ⋅exp⁡(−1ℏ∫xx1∣p(x′)∣dx′)],(x<x1)(c) \psi(x)=\left\{ \begin{aligned} &\frac{D}{\sqrt{|p(x)|}}\exp \left( -\frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x_2}^{x}|p(x')|dx' \right), \quad (x > x_2) &(a)\\ &\frac{2D}{\sqrt{p(x)}}\sin \left( \frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_2}p(x')dx' + \frac{\pi}{4} \right), \quad (x_1 < x < x_2) &(b)\\ &\frac{D}{\sqrt{|p(x)|}}\left[ 2\cos\theta \cdot \exp \left( \frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_1}|p(x')|dx' \right) \right. \\ &\left. +\sin\theta \cdot \exp \left( -\frac{1}{\hbar}\int_{x}^{x_1}|p(x')|dx' \right) \right], \quad (x < x_1) &(c)\\ \end{aligned} \right. ψ(x)=⎩⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎨⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎪⎧​​∣p(x)∣​D​exp(−ℏ1​∫x2​x​∣p(x′)∣dx′),(x>x2​)p(x)​2D​sin(ℏ1​∫xx2​​p(x′)dx′+4π​),(x1​<x<x2​)∣p(x)∣​D​[2cosθ⋅exp(ℏ1​∫xx1​​∣p(x′)∣dx′)+sinθ⋅exp(−ℏ1​∫xx1​​∣p(x′)∣dx′)],(x<x1​)​(a)(b)(c)​ (5)(5)(5)

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

E=mc21−(v/c)2 E=\frac{mc^2}{\sqrt{1-(v/c)^2}} E=1−(v/c)2​mc2​ (1)(1)(1)

I like the equation eeeee. 1.
